welcome_message_body: Welcome to Northampton, a charming city known for its rich history, beautiful architecture, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this wonderful city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northampton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Northampton Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
